divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on my porch when I noticed a star formation that didn't seem familiar. I started to loo closely at it which formed a triangle shape. I know their are many stars that can create the seem effect but I noticed something strange. It had two more lights which sat between the point light and the bottom two lights. As I noticed that I could see the bottom right light start to glow into an orange color. This light began to pulsate brighter and dimmer as the lights begin to drift up higher. I could see some sort of dark undertones that made it look solid. I also could see a plane flying towards it. The plane actually some how flew begind the the lower light of the object. As I tried to to stare at it more intently I could see a small light hovering from the top to the middle of the object. Then as my mind began to think this might actually be a ufo a flying lighted object struck right in front of the object. It kind of made me jump because in the back of my head I had been rationalizing that this was my mind playing a cruel joke on me. I went inside and told my sister that I had just seen a ufo. I went back outside and the lights were gone. Note: Right before all this happened I had seen a large orange cloud that freaked me out cause it looked like fire was burning under it. For a second I thought the neighborhood across the street was on fire. It almost look like smoke it was a cloud.
Summary: Second UFO Encounter (A triangle shaped ship and strange "shooting star")
